ingredients.content: 600 g celeriac, peeled, cut in pieces (3 cm)
120 g celery stalks, cut in pieces (3 cm)
150 g cooking apples, cored, quartered (e.g. Bramley)
100 g dessert apples, cored, quartered (e.g. Braeburn, Cox, Gala)
¼ tsp freshly ground pepper, or to taste

preparations.content: Place celeriac, onions, celery, garlic and butter in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula. Chop again <b>3 sec/speed 6<b> then sauté <b>5 min/100°C/speed 2<b>.
Add apples, salt and pepper then cook again <b>15 min/100°C/speed 2<b>. Blend <b>1-3 min/speed 10<b> until desired texture is reached. Adjust seasoning to taste before serving.
